title: The God Part of the Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/12/20
itunes:title: The God Part of the Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/12/20
description:
George Noory and philosopher Matthew Alper explore his research into the neurology of the brain, and if humans are wired to believe in a creator God even if there is no physical evidence.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
